title: Remco Evenepoel lays warning for road worlds with Clásica San Sebastián victory
content:
Evenepoel outsprints Pello Bilbao to defend San Sebastián title in show of strength ahead of next weekend's world championship road race.

Read the full article at Remco Evenepoel lays warning for road worlds with Clásica San Sebastián victory on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
